wikipedia_page.main: Adrian Salmon is a comic book artist and illustrator from England.

link_mentions.page: Dalek comic strips, illustrated annuals and graphic novels
response: * Children of the Revolution - Issues 312–317 (9 January 2002 – 29 May 2002) Writer: Scott Gray. Artists: Lee Sullivan, Adrian Salmon.

*This is the final Bernice Summerfield audio with artwork by Adrian Salmon, and the final audio to use the old numbering system. Starting with The Kraken's Lament the brand is rebooted, though it is a continuation of the same story.
